title: Student-Centered Physical Education (PE) Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course applying student-centered learning design methodologies for current secondary physical education teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more student engagement strategies to physical education lesson design
Learners can develop one or more student-led project evaluation tools
Learners can design learning activities utilizing digital tools (BYOD) in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
